alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 20 at 4:02PM MDT until August 20 at 4:30PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Jefferson County in central Colorado... * Until 430 PM MDT. * At 402 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Conifer, or 21 miles southwest of Denver, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Public. At 359 PM, the public reported quarter size hail in eastern Conifer. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Jefferson County. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
